page.title: 19BURTON V.C. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was established in{1844. Then it was a large stone building, with a house attached, where the{Head {Teacher}lived. It still has the old buildings; but two mobile classrooms have been added and the school house is empty. It is a{Junior/Infants Mixed School with{99 pupils.}The age range is 4-11 and when we leave we go to a{Secondary {School.}There are four classes each with its respective teacher:{Miss {John,}Reception;{Mrs. Smith,}Infants; {Mrs. Llewhellin,}Junior 1 and 2;{Mr. {Devonald,}the Headmaster, Junior 3 and 4. There is a School Canteen where meals are cooked. We have a large playground and a extensive grassy area and copse.
